Package net.jordaria.item

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Damage
    A map of elements and their respective damage value.
    Item
    A base item with a colored name.
    ItemArmor
    An Item subclass representing armor ingame.
    ItemNothing
    An Item subclass that represents nothing.
    ItemPotion
    An item subclass representing a potion with some effect.
    ItemStack
    Contains an item and an amount representing the quantity of the item in the stack.
    ItemStackable
    An item which can be placed in stacks.
    ItemWeapon
    An Item subclass representing a weapon ingame.
    Lore
    Three lines of colored text which are given to items.
    Protection
    A map of elements and their respective protection value.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ArmorSlot
    An enum of different slots for armor.
    Element
    An enum of elements.
    PotionEffect
    An enum of potion effects, their index and names.
    Quality
    An enum of qualities for items.
